languages.text: "Запрос отклонен. Если мы не даруем ему спасение, то даруем хотя бы милостивую деактивацию".
"Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."
languages.original_text: "Запрос отклонен. Если мы не даруем ему спасение, то даруем хотя бы милостивую деактивацию".

traits.locale_text: "Request declined. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."
"Request declined. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."
"Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."
"Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."
"Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."
"Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."

languages.text: "Anfrage abgewiesen. Wenn wir ihm keine Erlösung gewähren, dann gewähren wir ihm zumindest eine gnadenvolle Deaktivierung."
languages.original_text: "Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage abgewiesen. Wenn wir ihm keine Erlösung gewähren, dann gewähren wir ihm zumindest eine gnadenvolle Deaktivierung."

languages.text: « Requête refusée. Si nous ne lui accordons pas le salut, laissons-le au moins bénéficier d'une désactivation miséricordieuse. »
languages.original_text: "Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."

traits.locale_text: « Requête refusée. Si nous ne lui accordons pas le salut, laissons-le au moins bénéficier d'une désactivation miséricordieuse. »

languages.text: “请求已拒绝。如果我们无法拯救他，至少我们应该仁慈地终止他的生命机能。”
languages.original_text: "Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."

traits.locale_text: “请求已拒绝。如果我们无法拯救他，至少我们应该仁慈地终止他的生命机能。”

languages.text: 「要求は拒否された。彼に救いを与えないなら、せめて私が慈悲で非アクティブ化しよう」
languages.original_text: "Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."

traits.locale_text: 「要求は拒否された。彼に救いを与えないなら、せめて私が慈悲で非アクティブ化しよう」

languages.text: «Solicitud denegada. Si no le concedemos la salvación, concedámosle al menos una desactivación misericordiosa».
languages.original_text: "Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."

traits.locale_text: «Solicitud denegada. Si no le concedemos la salvación, concedámosle al menos una desactivación misericordiosa».

languages.text: "Talep reddedildi. Kurtuluşa erdiremiyorsak en azından acısız bir kapatılma bahşedelim."
languages.original_text: "Request denied. If we are not granting him salvation, let us at least grant him a merciful deactivation."

traits.locale_text: "Talep reddedildi. Kurtuluşa erdiremiyorsak en azından acısız bir deaktivasyon bahşedelim."
